home.tagline: Regen Lanes — Interior Construction & Custom Furniture
home.heroDescription: At Regen Lanes, we transform spaces with precision, creativity, and craftsmanship. Whether you're renovating an entire home or upgrading a single room, our team delivers beautiful, functional interiors built to last. From full-scale construction to bespoke furniture, we bring your ideas to life with exceptional quality — and at a fraction of the cost.
home.whatWeDoDescription: At Regen Lanes Holding Company Limited, we provide end-to-end interior construction services — from structural renovations to finishing details. Whether you're transforming your entire home, upgrading your kitchen, redesigning your bathroom, or refreshing a single room, our team delivers flawless results every time.
home.servicesDescription1: At Regen Lanes Holding Company Limited, we provide end-to-end interior construction services — from structural renovations to finishing details. Whether you are transforming your entire home, upgrading your kitchen, redesigning your bathroom, or refreshing a single room, our team delivers flawless results every time.
home.servicesDescription2: We also build custom furniture, handcrafted to your style and measurements. Show us a picture, and we will recreate it at a fraction of the cost without compromising on quality.
home.transparentPricingDesc: No hidden costs, just honest value.
home.residentialDesc: Full-scale renovation and interior styling for modern homes and condos.
home.commercialDesc: Office and retail design that communicates brand identity through space.
home.consultationDesc: Space planning, 3D rendering, and curated material selection advice.
home.shareAmbitions: Share your ambitions and we will respond with a tailored scope, timeline, and investment guide.

about.title: About Regen Lanes
about.description: Regen Lanes Holding Company Limited is a Bangkok-based interior construction and custom furniture partner dedicated to transforming residential and commercial spaces with precision, longevity, and calm minimalism.
about.missionText: Create beautiful, functional interiors that feel effortless to live and work in.
about.visionText: Be Thailand's most trusted interior construction partner for discerning, detail-focused clients.
about.philosophyDescription: We curate atmospheres—balancing traditional craftsmanship with modern, minimalist lines. Every material, joint, and finish is considered so the final space feels calm, intentional, and built to last.

values.craftsmanshipFirstDesc: Built by specialists who obsess over joints, finishes, and structural integrity.
values.precisionPlanningDesc: Measured drawings, clear scopes, and realistic timelines keep projects on track.
values.endToEndDesc: Construction, millwork, and installation handled by one accountable team.
values.minimalWarmDesc: Clean lines, honest materials, and lighting that make spaces feel calm and intentional.

about.letDiscuss: Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life with our expertise.

fullRenovation.title: Full Home Interior Construction & Renovation
fullRenovation.subtitle: Complete home transformation.
fullRenovation.description: Regen Lanes provides complete home renovations including demolition, structural adjustments, MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing), flooring, lighting, built-ins, and comprehensive project management. We handle every detail to turn your vision into a livable masterpiece.
fullRenovation.whyTitle: Reimagining your sanctuary from the ground up.
fullRenovation.whyDesc1: A full home renovation allows for a cohesive design language throughout your property. It resolves underlying structural issues and upgrades aging systems, adding significant value and comfort to your asset.
fullRenovation.whyDesc2: We approach each project as a collaboration, respecting the architectural integrity of the building while injecting modern functionality tailored to your lifestyle.
fullRenovation.demolitionStructureDesc: Safe demolition of existing interiors and precise structural adjustments to open up spaces and redefine layouts.
fullRenovation.mepSystemsDesc: Complete overhaul of Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing systems to ensure safety, efficiency, and modern standards.
fullRenovation.flooringFinishesDesc: Installation of premium flooring, wall treatments, and painting using high-quality materials for a flawless finish.
fullRenovation.lightingDesignDesc: Architectural lighting planning and installation to enhance mood, functionality, and spatial aesthetics.
fullRenovation.builtInsFurnitureDesc: Custom carpentry and built-in furniture designed specifically for your space and storage needs.
fullRenovation.projectManagementDesc: End-to-end supervision, timeline control, and quality assurance to ensure a stress-free renovation experience.

kitchen.title: Kitchen Remodeling
kitchen.subtitle: Where culinary precision meets design elegance. The heart of your home, reimagined.
kitchen.recipeDesc: We specialize in creating kitchens that are as beautiful as they are functional. From custom cabinetry and premium countertops to intelligent appliance integration and ergonomic layouts, every detail is crafted to enhance your culinary experience.
kitchen.customCabinetryDesc: Bespoke joinery designed to maximize storage and match your aesthetic. Featuring soft-close hardware and premium finishes tailored to your space.
kitchen.lightingDesignDesc: Layered lighting schemes including under-cabinet task lighting, pendant statement pieces, and ambient mood lighting.
kitchen.countertopsDesc: Exquisite and durable surfaces including Quartz, Granite, Marble, and Sintered Stone, precision-cut for a flawless and hygienic fit.
kitchen.tilingDesc: Curated selection of tiles, mosaics, or stone slabs to create stunning backsplashes that serve as the visual centerpiece of the room.
kitchen.functionalLayoutDesc: Expert space planning that optimizes the "work triangle," islands, and traffic flow to ensure your kitchen is practical for cooking and socializing.
kitchen.applianceIntegrationDesc: Seamless installation of built-in ovens, concealed refrigerators, and smart kitchen systems for a streamlined and modern look.
kitchen.ctaDesc: Let us help you design a kitchen that brings your family together.

bathroom.title: Bathroom Sanctuary
bathroom.subtitle: Transforming your daily routine into a private wellness ritual.
bathroom.luxuryDesc: We elevate bathrooms beyond mere utility. Our renovation services focus on creating a harmonious balance of waterproofing integrity, ergonomic design, and luxury aesthetics. From rain showers to freestanding soaking tubs, we build spaces where you can truly unwind.
bathroom.waterproofingDesc: Industry-standard membrane applications to ensure zero leaks and long-term protection against moisture damage and mold.
bathroom.customVanitiesDesc: Floating or floor-standing vanity units designed for optimal storage, topped with durable stone surfaces and integrated sinks.
bathroom.tilingStoneDesc: Expert installation of ceramic, porcelain, or natural stone tiles with precision grouting for walls and anti-slip floors.
bathroom.lightingVentilationDesc: Strategic lighting for makeup and mood, combined with quiet, high-efficiency exhaust systems to maintain air quality.
bathroom.premiumFixturesDesc: Selection and installation of high-end faucets, rain showers, freestanding bathtubs, and modern sanitary ware.
bathroom.luxuryFeaturesDesc: Integration of smart toilets, heated towel rails, steam systems, and niche shelving for that 5-star hotel experience.
bathroom.serenityDesc1: A great bathroom design considers the flow of movement and the tactile experience of materials. We use natural stone, warm woods, and matte finishes to create a soothing palette.
bathroom.serenityDesc2: Whether you dream of a centerpiece freestanding bathtub or a spacious walk-in rain shower, our team maximizes every inch to deliver functionality without compromising on style.

singleRoom.title: Single Room Transformation
singleRoom.subtitle: The Art of the Single Space
singleRoom.heroDesc: Redefining your home, one room at a time.
singleRoom.focusDesc: Not every project requires a whole-home overhaul. Whether you are looking to modernize a dated living area, create a productive home office, or build the walk-in closet of your dreams, we bring the same level of precision and luxury to single-room transformations as we do to full-scale renovations.
singleRoom.livingRoomDesc: The center of domestic life. We design living rooms that balance aesthetic appeal with everyday comfort, featuring custom media units, harmonious layouts, and sophisticated lighting schemes.
singleRoom.homeOfficeDesc: Productivity meets style. We design ergonomic workspaces with custom shelving, optimized lighting, and cable management solutions to keep you focused and inspired.
singleRoom.masterBedroomDesc: Create your personal sanctuary. Our bedroom renovations focus on acoustics, soothing palettes, and integrated headboards to ensure deep rest and relaxation.
singleRoom.walkInClosetDesc: Redesigned with functionality and elegance. Custom joinery, island units, and dedicated shoe displays turn your dressing area into a boutique experience.
singleRoom.costEffectiveDesc: Focus your budget on high-quality materials for a smaller area to achieve a luxurious finish without overspending.
singleRoom.minimalDisruptionDesc: Faster turnaround times mean less impact on your daily life compared to a full home renovation.
singleRoom.targetedNeedsDesc: Solve specific pain points—like a lack of storage or poor lighting—exactly where they matter most.
singleRoom.instantRefreshDesc: Transform the mood of your home instantly by upgrading the spaces you use the most.

customFurniture.title: Custom Furniture Manufacturing
customFurniture.subtitle: Bespoke pieces handcrafted to your exact style and measurements.
customFurniture.showUsTitle: Show us a picture, and we recreate it.
customFurniture.showUsDesc: Seen a designer piece you love but it doesn't fit your budget or space? We specialize in recreating high-end furniture styles with premium local materials at a fraction of the cost, without compromising on quality or aesthetics.
customFurniture.andMoreDesc: Custom requests welcome to meet your specific needs.
customFurniture.perfectFitDesc: Measurements tailored to the millimeter to fit your specific space constraints.
customFurniture.yourStyleDesc: Choose your wood, fabric, finish, and hardware. Total creative control.
customFurniture.lastingQualityDesc: Built by skilled artisans using durable materials meant to last a lifetime.
